# Government Tender Announcement: Custom Ear Protection for Department of National Defence

## Tender Title (English): Custom Ear Protection W0100-233839
## Tender Title (French): Protection Auditive sur Mesure W0100-233839

### Tender Details

*   Tender Reference Number: WS4343328050-Doc4398007898
*   Amendment Number: 6
*   Publication Date: January 23, 2024
*   Tender Closing Date: February 23, 2024 at 14:00 EST
*   Expected Contract Start Date: Not Applicable
*   Expected Contract End Date: March 31, 2031

### Tender Status

*   Tender Status (English): Cancelled
*   Tender Status (French): Annulé

### Procurement Details

*   Procurement Category: Goods and Services
*   Procurement Method: Competitive Open Bidding
*   UNSPSC Codes: 46000000, 46180000
*   PROMPT End Date: Not Applicable

### Trade Agreements

*   Trade Agreements: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

### Regions of Opportunity

*   Regions of Opportunity (English): Nova Scotia
*   Regions of Opportunity (French): Nouvelle-Écosse

### Contracting and Contact Details

*   Contracting Entity Name: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
*   Contracting Entity Address: 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, QC, K1A 0S5, Canada
*   Contact Person: Kendra Boroczki, PSPC

### Tender Description

*   The Department of National Defence is seeking offerors to provide custom fit decibel blocking ear protection for CH148 maintenance personnel at 12 Wing Shearwater, in Shearwater, Nova Scotia.
*   All required supporting documentation and responses must be submitted by February 23, 2024 at 14:00 EST. 

### Notice URL

*   https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18541053?extsite=MTg1NDEwNTNfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==
